desc: Carasoin is a full service boutique day spa and skin clinic located in the very heart of West Hollywood. Known for the Carasoin Cold Fusi...

layout.text: The spa is a mix of British and Swiss sensibilities, designed to provide a chic and intimate setting; one which feels more like you’re stepping in to an elegant home, even though you have just entered an advanced Day Spa & Skin Clinic that showcases the highest standards and technology in skincare.
